songs.title: Alobam
songs.lyrics:
Alobam
Ha Men kpasa na ogbe juo ese iga
Afu naha bu alobam (Straight up)
Men mu anya , ahu adiro hu kwa
Akam , iga afu naha bu alobam (Straight up)
Men kpasa na ogbe juo ese iga
Afu naha bu alobam (Straight up)
Men mu anya , ahu adiro hu kwa
Akam , iga afu naha bu alobam (Straight up)

Verse 1:

Huh
Hoo A
Stand up guy, yeah i know
You got my back ibu alobam, alobam
Repping for these niggas from city to
City , i know you got me, ibu alobam
Alobam
Men kpasa na ogbe juo ese iga afu
Naha bu alobam , alobam
Repping for these niggas from city to
City , i know you got me, ibu alobam
Alobam

Onye eze bu eze , ima na okwa chi na
Eme eze , abum nwa biara ije nke
Mbu
Oya nwanne biko juo ese, onye yeli
Nya ye , ka onudu nwanne ya gbawe
Ka obaye next level ka iri nji na ndu
Ya ga fe, living, individualssss are
Taking my pictures
While i'm taking in what matters
Mmmm aaa well let me greet ya
Put my city on and they ever rated
They ball, a bum onu na ekwulu ilo
Ngwa shout out to mister raw hahhh
Haa

Shorty

Take a picture

Shey you no know me

Verse 2:
Hehe
Ndi a na ene mu anya, na the boy is
Not ready
Na acho ina pum ife
But they know I'm gon get it
Shoutout to the niggas will be repping
For my city
Steady telling me together ma ayi
Finally we made it made it
Neh nwa mmbada ,keh di way onye
Ko lu mu two , mmu nwa nko the way
Guys na afu uzi hana ezim di way , na
Agba mbo ima na ha na nweta di pay
Huh

Ahh Men kpasa na ogbe juo ese iga
Afu naha bu alobam , alobam
Repping for these niggas from city to
City , i know you got me, ibu alobam
Alobam
Maka i'm killing all these niggas ma
Gbalu ha mgba nu, nna acho so so
Ihe nga ji tuo them mmanu
I got my eyes on this status , keh
When , mpuo ha ana ajum nwanne i
So na nkanu ?
Mmu na alobam si na we no dey
Carry last
Na akusa si the place ha si
Na odisi ka jazz
And i addi sha ha ga aju gi what next
Pino pino form o guys iga agba ha
Set
Heh adi godum woooo,adi godum
Wooo and ha na akokwa twooooo
Na kwa umu ajebo now na form
Shooter , obu na ida ako maka
Money nwanne ina ako toooo ha

Stand up guy yeah i know you got my
Back alobam, alobam
Anu welu obi , anu welu obi , ibu
Alobam , haaa

Ayi nature chide white men toh na

Kedu gab afo chukwu

With fans everywhere ha ncha na eku zi mmu ikuku
